heading: HR02048
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO HOW THE OVERSEAS WORKERS WELFARE ADMINISTRATION (OWWA) REINTEGRATION FUNDS ARE BEING SPENT, AND WHERE OR WHAT PROGRAMS SUCH FUND HAVE BEEN ALLOCATED TO - FROM THE TIME REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10801, OR THE OWWA ACT, HAS BEEN ENACTED INTO LAW
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-08-07
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02048
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO HOW THE OVERSEAS WORKERS WELFARE ADMINISTRATION (OWWA) REINTEGRATION FUNDS ARE BEING SPENT, AND WHERE OR WHAT PROGRAMS SUCH FUND HAVE BEEN ALLOCATED TO - FROM THE TIME REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10801, OR THE OWWA ACT, HAS BEEN ENACTED INTO LAW
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MANALO, JESULITO A.
DATE FILED : 2018-08-01
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
